entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning this evening then changing to snow or rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers changing to a few rain showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
